description: The CompassVPN Dashboard provides comprehensive real-time monitoring of VPN infrastructure, featuring server performance metrics, Xray traffic analytics, and VPN configuration management. Track system resources, user connections, bandwidth usage, and security metrics in a unified interface.

targets.expr: node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{donor="$donor", instance=~"$node"} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{donor="$donor", instance=~"$node"} - (node_memory_Cached_bytes{donor="$donor", instance=~"$node"} + node_memory_Buffers_bytes{donor="$donor", instance=~"$node"})

node_network_transmit_bytes_total{donor="$donor", instance="$node", device="eth0"} or node_network_transmit_bytes_total{donor="$donor", instance="$node", device="venet0"} or node_network_transmit_bytes_total{donor="$donor", instance="$node", device="ens3"}

panels.description: Number of unique users actively connected to the server. (Approximately)
panels.title: Active Unique Users

panels.description: Total number of connections established over time. This includes all connection attempts, including reconnections.
panels.title: Total Connection Count

panels.description: Average number of connections per unique user.
panels.title: Connections per User

panels.description: Number of requests blocked by routing rules over time period.
panels.title: Blocked Requests

panels.description: Percentage of requests that are blocked by routing rules.
panels.title: Blocked Requests Percentage

title: CompassVPN Dashboard
